Preparation for abdominal examination
/circle6 Ask the woman to empty her bladder (give her a clean bottle to collect a sample of urine 
for testing) immediately before proceeding with the abdominal examination. Th  is is 
important as even a half-full bladder might result in an increase in the fundal height.
